entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
